original_text: The allotment for Joseph began at the Jordan, east of the springs of Jericho, and went up from there through the desert into the hill country of Bethel.
korean_text: 요셉 자손이 제비 뽑은 것은 여리고 샘 동쪽 곧 여리고 곁 요단으로부터 광야로 들어가 여리고로부터 벧엘 산지로 올라가고

sentences.original_text: The allotment for Joseph began at the Jordan,
east of the springs of Jericho,
and went up from there through the desert
into the hill country of Bethel.
